Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I have downloaded FAR as a mod-pack for KSP and the gamed worked all well. So I took away all of the FAR files ( Plugins, PluginData ) to try something on the vanilla game. I switch on the game, and the control surfaces don't respond, the lift indicator does not show...

I did not remove the FAR Extras to the Cockpits and Pods because I deemed it unnecessary. Is this a reason for the non-responding control surfaces ?

Thanks for your help,

Henri von Braun
It overwrites the default behaviour, you need to restore the stock parts from the backup.

All right, I'll give it a try and I'll come back...

Oh and thanks by the way!
